titleStmt.title: Daniels weekes an interpretation of part of the prophecy of Daniel / by Joseph Mede ...
titleStmt.author: Mede, Joseph, 1586-1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. F. for John Clark ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library, and Huntington Library .
Item at reel 794:45 is seventh item bound with: Clavis apocalyptica (M1594).
A variant of this items is found as part of Wing M1585 at reel 391:4.
